title: Firefly to unveil TrichoSystem at ISHRS 2015!
text:
Firefly to unveil TrichoSystem at ISHRS 2015! August 31, 2015 -- Belmont, MA (PRWEB) August 31, 2015 Returning for another year at the International Society of Hair Restoration Surgery (ISHRS) meeting, Firefly is set to unveil their new DE330T Digital TrichoScope in the George Tiemann & Co booth. The Boston based company, which has been selling its cameras to some of the most prestigious organizations around the globe, has now partnered with Trilogic, the developers of internationally recognized TrichoSciencePro professional hair and scalp diagnostic software, to create TrichoSystem - the most advanced and complete work platform, specifically suited for hair and scalp surgeons and technicians needs. TrichoSystem covers the entire spectrum of procedures, hair and scalp professionals will see in their practice. TrichoSystem can detect and calculate hair density, thickness, length, growth and shed rate, while allowing for follicular unit and perifollicular sign counts, generate charts, conclusions and reports based on a patients age, gender, race, and other factors. The software also has a vast knowledgebase for Trichology studies and Dermatoscopy, leveraging built-in images to compare and diagnose various hair and scalp conditions. Moreover, TrichoSystem delivers these features with a user interface that is easy to learn and easy to use on a daily basis. ISHRS is a global non-profit medical association and the leading authority on hair loss treatment and restoration with more than 1,200 members throughout 70 countries worldwide. Firefly first unveiled their cameras to the ISHRS community in 2013 and, since partnering with Trilogic, has perfected their technology to create the DE330T, a high precision follicular camera for the hair and scalp community. A quote from Firefly Globals CEO, Kapriel Karagozyan, illustrates the companys excitement for the partnership We take great care in developing devices and systems that are not only intuitive to use, but also benefit individuals on both sides of the camera. Trilogic has a similar mindset which made the partnership a natural next step. Working together we have created a powerful, affordable solution for the hair community. Firefly Global is in the business of making high quality, affordable, video otoscopes and digital dermatoscopes for organizations worldwide. Firefly wireless and wired cameras are small, easy to use and standards-based, making integration with video conferencing solutions quick and easy. Already popular in Ear-Nose-Throat, Audiology, Primary Care, Telemedicine and Dermatology, the number of Hair and Skin specialists using Firefly are multiplying rapidly. TrichoSystem, Firefly, and George Tiemann can be found at ISHRS in booths # 62 through 65 from September 10th to the 12th. Visit http://www.trichosystem.com and http://www.fireflyglobal.com to learn more. 
Read the full story at http://www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12933324.htm .
